name: Aphelion (Smash-Entertainment)
description:
Welcome to a dystopian universe, where futuristic gladiators wage war for the benefit of the general public. Show your prowess, in front of crowds of spectators, win and survive. 

Fight across a vertical battlefield with a variety of powerful weapons to collect , but beware the gravity is ever changing.... 

Player 1 (Top Screen) is controlled using the keyboard. WASD to move, Mouse to aim, Space to jump, Left click to shoot and Right click to fire Grappling Hook.

Player 2 (Bottom Screen) is controlled using an Xbox 360 controller (although any controller should work). Both joysticks are used to move and aim,  A button to jump, Right Bumper to shoot and Left bumper to fire Grappling Hook.

(If you find yourself stuck in a platform press the grapple-hook fire button again to fix the issue)
